name: WRIGHTON AVIATION PTY LTD
about: At Wrighton Aviation, our mission is to provide a new approach to flight training in the Mackay and Whitsundays region. We focus on cutting-edge training that embraces innovation, advanced technology, and the demands of a rapidly evolving industry. Emphasizing safety, responsibility, and professionalism, we tailor our programs to meet each student's unique needs and goals. Our student-centered approach builds confidence and prepares students for the challenges of the aviation industry. We maintain the highest safety standards, leveraging state-of-the-art resources and fostering industry partnerships to ensure our students are well-prepared for a successful aviation career. Welcome to the future of flight training at Wrighton Aviation.
services:
["Recreational Pilot License (RPL)
Recreational Pilot License Endorsements
PRIVATE PILOT LICENCE (PPL)
